getFee(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,uint.details: Reverts with appropriate reason upon invalid message.

params.message: The cross-chain CCIP message including data and/or tokens

returns.fee: returns execution fee for the message delivery to destination chain, denominated in the feeToken specified in the message.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.notice: Validates the message content, forwards it to the CCIP router and returns the result.

getFee(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,uint.notice: Simply forwards the request to the CCIP router and returns the result.

getToken().notice: Returns the token that this proxy is allowed to send.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

documentation.text: @notice Only this token is allowed to be sent using this proxy
